products.name: Natural Face Cream
products.description: A gentle, natural face cream for daily use. This luxurious cream provides deep hydration and nourishment for all skin types.
products.usage: Apply a small amount to clean face and neck, morning and evening.

products.name: Hydrating Body Lotion
products.description: Rich, moisturizing body lotion with natural ingredients.
products.usage: Apply generously to clean skin after bathing.
